docs.lead_paragraph: The abortion issue has put members of Congress who support abortion rights in a quandary over the health care legislation.

headline.main: In Congress, a Predicament for Abortion Supporters

docs.abstract: Members of Congress who support abortion rights face a quandary over whether to compromise on the issue and vote for health care legislation that would otherwise improve health care for women.

docs.lead_paragraph: Update | 11:35 p.m. The McCain campaign dissed Sarah Palin, muffled her, and then stuck her with a $50,000 legal bill - that, at least, is the version of events she tells in her new book, due to be released next week.

headline.main: Rolling Out Sarah Palin's Side of the Story

docs.lead_paragraph: If you want to relive the magic or trauma -- or both -- of childbirth, you might want to check out the live streamed (now recorded) birth of Solveig, who was born on a live streaming video. Lynsee, his mother, is a former teacher and she decided to have her baby on live web video as an educational gesture. (She is a saint during the whole process, which may explain her generous nature.)

headline.main: This Birth Annnouncement Coming to You Live from the Delivery Room

docs.abstract: Famous at birth: Baby born on live streaming video. And yes, he's adorable, perfect in every way.
docs.snippet: Famous at birth: Baby born on live streaming video. And yes, he's adorable, perfect in every way.
